channel.title: Unsaved options: Bug or failure on my part?
channel.description: So in order to play Black Mesa I have to change options such as difficulty, model quality, etc... One annoying thing is that once I close the game, when I reopen it the changed options are reverted. Is this a bug or am I not pressing a certain button or changing a certain option? Thanks
